00041 class MiniDumper
00042 {
00043 protected:
00044         static MiniDumper *gpDumper;
00045         static LONG WINAPI Handler( struct _EXCEPTION_POINTERS *pExceptionInfo );
00046 
00047         _EXCEPTION_POINTERS *m_pExceptionInfo;
00048         time_t m_lTime;
00049 
00050         TCHAR m_szDumpPath[_MAX_PATH];
00051         TCHAR m_szAppPath[_MAX_PATH];
00052         TCHAR m_szAppBaseName[_MAX_PATH];
00053         LONG WriteMiniDump(_EXCEPTION_POINTERS *pExceptionInfo );
00054         BOOL m_bHeadless;
00055 
00056         virtual void VSetDumpFileName(void);
00057         virtual MINIDUMP_USER_STREAM_INFORMATION *VGetUserStreamArray() { return NULL; }
00058         virtual const TCHAR *VGetUserMessage() { return _T(""); }
00059 
00060 public:
00061         MiniDumper(bool headless);
00062 };
